name: Galaxy Adventure An Adventure In Spaaaaaace
name_original: Galaxy Adventure An Adventure In Spaaaaaace
description:
Its a galaxy adventure in space! What more could you want? 

You and your crew can travel to distant planets and meet strange new people who could be real friendly-like or could end up being your worst nightmare. You never know what you'll find out there in space so why don't you come aboard and lead your crew on your next big adventure . . . IN SPACE!

Expect some post jam updates coming soon!
